cast.name: 斯图尔特·布伦南 Stuart Brennan

director.name: 斯图尔特·布伦南 Stuart Brennan

introduction: Revolt is on the horizon in the ancient city of Lloris, ruled with an iron fist by the merciless Sheriff (Lord of the Rings’ Billy Boyd) and The Brute (The Hobbits’ Ryan Gage). Believing their mystical powers could help free the oppressed citizens from tyranny, a young human seeks out the aid of the reclusive elves and their legendary Warlord.However, with both sides harbouring secrets, and hiding their true motives, this tentative alliance between the humans and elves may bring about the downfall of them all.
